segments.text: Hi , Mr . Brown , we have visited the factories and I'm very satisfied with your factories production conditions .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , they are our main export bases of tools with the advantage of having good production experience and long historical record . All their products enjoy high prestige in the world market .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's very good . But I have little knowledge about the packing of your pliers . I just want to know the details about that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , I'll show you how the packing is like . We have a showroom on the ground floor . Let's go downstairs and have a look .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: These are the various kinds of packing for pliers . Normally , we have three types of packing
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , the packing looks very nice .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The skin packing is the most advanced packing for this product in the world market . It catches the eyes and can help push sales .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good , what about the export packing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , they are packed in boxes of two dozens each , 100 boxes to a wooden case .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is the wooden case strong enough for transportation ? You see , 100 boxes of pliers are very heavy . It's about 2,400 kilograms .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can rest assured of that . So far , no customers have complained about our outer packing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm glad to hear that . By the way , do you accept neutral packing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we can pack the goods according to your instructions .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very good . Ok , Mr . Brown , I'm now totally satisfied with your packing . You can execute our first order now , and I will open the L / C immediately after I return to Taipei .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . We'll make the shipment as soon as your L / C is on hand .
segments.speaker: S2
